qas.question: Compared to other countries, how large is the US?
Which country is the worlds fourth largest?
Who may also be the third largest country?
By land area only the United States is slightly larger or smaller than what other country?
China and the United States are larger than Russia and what other country in total area?

plausible_answers.text: The validity of China's claim on Aksai Chin and Trans-Karakoram Tract

qas.question: My total area land and water whether the United States is the third-largest country depends on what?

plausible_answers.text: updated the total area of United States a number of times

qas.question: Since the initial publication of the world factbook Guinness has done what?
Brazil is larger than what other two countries?

context: By total area (water as well as land), the United States is either slightly larger or smaller than the <b3_0>People's Republic of China<b3_0/>, making it the world's <a0_0>third or fourth largest country<a0_0/>. <b7_0>China and the United States<b7_0/> are smaller than Russia and <b4_0>Canada<b4_0/> in total area, but are larger than Brazil. By land area only (exclusive of waters), the United States is the world's third largest country, after Russia and China, with <a1_0>Canada<a1_0/> in fourth. Whether the US or <a2_0>China<a2_0/> is the third largest country by total area depends on two factors: (1) <b5_0>The validity of China's claim on Aksai Chin and Trans-Karakoram Tract<b5_0/>. Both these territories are also claimed by India, so are not counted; and (2) How US calculates its own surface area. Since the initial publishing of the World Factbook, the CIA has <b6_0>updated the total area of United States a number of times<b6_0/>.
